casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 4984. First Appellate District, Division One. October 22, 1924.] WILLIAM H. BROWN, Appellant, v. FRANK SYKES et al., Respondents.

Sloss, Ackerman & Bradley for Appellant.

George Lull, City Attorney, and Maurice T. Dooling, Jr., Assistant City Attorney, for Respondents.

KNIGHT, J.

The question involved in this case is in all respects similar to that in Hurley v. Sykes et al., ante, p. 310 [231 Pac. 748]. Upon the authority of that case it is ordered that the judgment be reversed and that a *795decree be entered in favor of appellant, with, the direction that the writ issue.

Tyler, P. J., and St. Sure, J., concurred.
